channel.title: Deltascape Server help!
channel.description:
Im making a private server based on deltascape! i got it running but there are somethings in which i dont know how to do it? Please help me answer them..
1. How do i change the start point and home of server? 2. How do i add commands? like ::pure 3. When you start, on the chat box(in some servers)it gives you a message saying vote on www.blahblah.com(lol, dont click idk if its real!), how do i change that? 4. How can i make it so that i have infinite run energy? 5. Last, how do i change the fight cave waves from 63 to i.e 7 waves?
please please please take the time to answer my questions the best you can. Also only answer if you have or now about deltascape based servers!

item.title: Deltascape Server help!
item.dc:creator: @mister_G mister G
item.description:
@mister_G wrote:

thanks i found it

Read full topic

item.title: Deltascape Server help!
item.dc:creator: @ballin2005 ballin2005
item.description:
@ballin2005 wrote:

“When you start, on the chat box(in some servers)it gives you a message saying vote on www.blahblah.com(lol, dont click idk if its real!), how do i change that?”

Thats in your client, search for whatever it says like “Welcome to…” and simply just change that to what ever you want it to say at the start of the server.

“How do i add commands? like ::pure”
Sometimes you will notice that the Search button comes in handy, there are 30+ questions on this same topic I bet you will find the result. Also, look through old guides posted in the guides section.

Read full topic
